name: Alireza Ghorbani

structured_info.background: Alireza Ghorbani is an Iranian vocalist who started his career with Quran recitation. He is a prolific performer both in Iran and internationally, and has experience composing music for television.

summary: Alireza Ghorbani is an Iranian singer and traditional vocalist with a background in Quran recitation, who has gained recognition for performances in Iran, internationally (including at the Queen Elizabeth Theatre in Vancouver), and his composition work for TV.

name: Khosro Soltani

structured_info.background: Khosro Soltani was an early mentor to Alireza Ghorbani.

summary: Khosro Soltani is known for being one of the first mentors to Alireza Ghorbani.
